articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Authorities Warned of Their Reckless Acts
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Authorities Warned of Their Reckless Acts
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on July 20 issued a statement condemning the U.S. and its followers for kicking up a campaign over the DPRK's legitimate measures to bolster up its capability for self-defence.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Strategic force units and other units of the ground, naval and air and anti-air forces of the Korean People's Army have recently conducted a series of drills with various missions under the simulated conditions of an actual war to bolster up the capability for self-defence such as the ones for ultra-precision tactical rocket firing and firing drills of diverse artillery pieces.
					
					 The service personnel and the people of the DPRK are greatly encouraged by the signal successes made in these drills of KPA units.
					
					 The peace- and justice-loving people in the world are expressing admiration at the shining successes of the service personnel and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that only the U.S. and its ally the Park Geun Hye group and some other undesirable forces are behaving mischievously, revealing their sinister intentions.
					
					 The U.S. grumbled as if tactical rockets of the KPA had gone into actions to strike its mainland, claiming "north Korea is posing an unusual and special threat to the U.S."
					
					 It is terming the routine drills of the KPA a politically-motivated low-profile provocation and successive military threats to the allies in the region.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are echoing the U.S. claim by asserting the tactical rocket firing and firing drills of artillery pieces by the KPA are a retaliation against their refusal of the DPRK's special proposal and its government's statement, a dangerous provocation to escalate the military tensions and a deliberate threat to them.
					
					 They went the lengths of letting the UN Security Council, a mechanism which has lost its impartiality long ago, kick up much fuss in a bid to mislead public opinion.
					
					 Some weak-willed countries are blindly joining in such odd charade. Clinging to the malodorous coattails of the U.S., they are going so reckless as to vie with each other to hug poor-looking Park Geun Hye.
					
					 In view of all these ridiculous ruckuses being staged by making profound confusion of right and wrong, the Policy Department of the NDC of the DPRK once again serves a strong warning to the U.S. and the south Korean authorities, their prime movers, reflecting the voices of the service personnel and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should properly know what words "provocation" and "threat" mean before wagging their tongues.
					
					 If the tactical rocket firing of the KPA is a "provocation" to the U.S. and a threat to regional stability and peace, then what should be said of the countless number of strategic missiles launched by the U.S. and the DPRK-targeted war drills frequently staged by it together with the south Korean military gangsters after bringing its forces to other country?
					
					 The real provocations and threats made to the Korean peninsula are the whole gamut of political and military moves being pushed forward by the U.S., pursuant to its hostile policy toward the DPRK and its belligerent military strategy.
					
					 In other words, the reckless intrusions into the waters of the DPRK side perpetrated by the warmongers of the south Korean military almost every day at the instigation of the U.S. are typical provocations.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should not resort to brazen-faced brigandish acts reminiscent of a thief brandishing a club.
					
					 The U.S., an arch criminal making provocations and threats, is kicking up high-intensity war drills for aggression every day in the land, waters and sky of other country. The U.S. and the south Korean authorities who are hell-bent on confrontation with the compatriots in the north at the former's beck and call are terming the military drills for self-defence conducted by the DPRK in its own land, waters and sky a "provocation" and a "threat." What are suitable words to accuse such impudent and brigandish behavior?
					
					 This is nothing but a shameless act of a burglar rudely behaving in face of the master of a house trying to protect his house by himself.
					
					 Such hooliganism may work somewhere else but can never work in this land being safeguarded by the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. and the south Korean authorities resort to gangster-like hostile acts, the more deadly retaliatory actions of Korean style they will face. This will be like a bolt from the blue.
					
					 The DPRK has already done everything it could to mend the north-south relations and achieve the reunification, peace and prosperity of the country through its crucial proposal and open letter in January, special proposal in June and government statement in July.
					
					 What remains to be done at present is to make a final choice.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should no longer behave recklessly, daring talk about "provocation" and "threat" from someone.
					
					 If they persist in doing so, all the self-defensive deterrent forces of the DPRK will keep themselves fully ready to punish all undesirable forces in the world, strikingly demonstrate its invincible might and strongly counter their moves through its practical retaliatory actions of justice.

articles.title: Greetings to Belgian King
articles.content:
Greetings to Belgian King
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Monday sent a message of greeting to Philippe, king of Belgium, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the Belgian people prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Friendship and Cultural Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship and Cultural Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A DPRK friendship and cultural delegation led by Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, returned home Monday after visiting the UK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Swiss Political Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Swiss Political Party
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Communist Party of Italian-Speaking Region in Switzerland.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Sunday by Lucchini Alessandro, deputy secretary for political affairs, who is heading the delegation of the party on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Brazilian Communist Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Brazilian Communist Party
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the Brazilian Communist Party.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Monday by Raul Kroeff, member of the Central Committee of the party who is heading its delegation.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Secretary General of African Regional Committee for Study of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Secretary General of African Regional Committee for Study of Juche Idea
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a letter by Andre Lohekele Kalonda, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, on July 8 on behalf of the participants in the regional on-line seminar on President Kim Il Sung and the independent development of Africa.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The Juche idea founded by the President and enriched by leader Kim Jong Il is clearly indicating the road to be followed by the world at present.
					
					 So, we reiterate our resolution to invariably uphold the President and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President, the sun of the 20th century.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism helps us know well about the pending issues of African countries.
					
					 Now the DPRK is wisely led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The building of a thriving nation is being accelerated in all fields of the DPRK and it is sure to win in succession thanks to Your Excellency.
					
					 The followers of the Juche idea in Africa fully support the efforts and resolution of Your Excellency for reunification of the Korean peninsula, the sacred cause of the President and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Pakchon, July 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Kim Kwan Chong, a woman centenarian living in Songsok-ri, Pakchon County, North Phyongan Province.
					 She was subject to maltreatment and humiliation as a member of a ruined nation before the liberation of Korea. 
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could enjoy a worthy life and happiness as a master of the country and land.
					
					 She worked hard to fulfill her duty as a peasant with one mind to repay the loving care of the party and the leader.
					
					 She is now leading an optimistic life and has a balanced diet.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Visit Kunja Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Visit Kunja Revolutionary Site
Songchon, July 21 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army visited the Kunja Revolutionary Site in Songchon County, South Phyongan Province on Monday with the approach of the anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (July 27, 1953).
					 The site is associated with the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by personally guiding the production of munitions on the spot and laying a solid foundation for self-reliant defence industry during the war. 
					
					 Climbing up a safety ladder in the tunnel from whose ceiling water was dropping, the President talked to officials and workers there and took deep care of weapons production, their study and living. 
					
					 The visitors laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of the President in the revolutionary site and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 After being briefed on the site, they went round the monument to the on-the-spot guidance of the President and the monument to revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They visited the Kunja Revolutionary Museum, Mortar Shop, Tools Shop, Grenade Shop, Bullets Shop and Submachine Gun Shop. 
					
					 They looked round materials and relics showing the spirit of defending the leader unto death, the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude and revolutionary optimism of the workers in Kunja-ri. 
					
					 Meanwhile, an oratorical meeting for explaining the greatness of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu took place before the statue of the President on the same day. 
					
					 The performers praised the exploits the peerless great persons performed by leading the great Fatherland Liberation War to shining victory and developing the Juche-oriented defence industry in prologue "May monument to war victory shine," chorus "Thinking of victory," group poem recital "Forward to the final victory!" and others.

articles.title: DPRK Strives to Prevent Flood Damage
articles.content:
DPRK Strives to Prevent Flood Damage
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- In the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, efforts are now concentrated on preventing flood damage.
					 Collieries and other mines and power stations have taken measures to go on production in a rainy spell, keeping drain pumps and motors in full readiness.
					
					 Railway workers reinforce railroad structures and repair revetments, readjusting the sites susceptible to downpour.
					
					 The fields of the construction and light industry step up the work to keep products and raw materials from flood damage.
					
					 The city management field strives to prevent possible spillover of rivers, while paying deep attention to the work for ensuring the normal supply of drinking water, not affected by flood.

articles.title: DPRK Encourages Tourism
articles.content:
DPRK Encourages Tourism
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The International Travel Company and other travel agencies in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now sponsoring various forms of tourism in the country.
					 They include mountaineering, architecture, sports, labor, business, angling, sightseeing and motoring and bicycling tours.
					
					 What is very popular among them is mountaineering tour. Alpinists from Switzerland already made tour of Piro Peak (1 909 meters high) in Mt. Myohyang and those from Germany, Britain, Norway, Belgium and other European countries enjoyed themselves in scenic Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 The bicycling tour, too, has drawn special interest from among the foreign tourists for several years. The tour is to be enjoyed by Europeans in August and September.
					
					 There are also a train tour of cities and scenic spots and a sightseeing tour in the capital city of Pyongyang by such public transport means as tramcar and metro.
					
					 Typical of sports tourisms is Taekwon-Do tour, peculiar to Korea. The Korea International Taekwon-Do Travel Company was set up in February this year to meet the growing demand of those who are eager to learn the Korean martial arts.
					
					 Besides, labor and business tours are brisk in the country. The labor tour helps the foreigners experience the labor life of the industrious Koreans by taking part in such production activities as rice-transplantation, weeding and fruit gathering in farm fields and orchards.

articles.title: Remodeling of May Day Stadium Continues Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Remodeling of May Day Stadium Continues Apace in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Remodeling of the May Day Stadium is now progressing apace on Rungna Islet in Pyongyang.
					 Soldier-builders have carried out 75 percent of the total project at present, covering the tile fixing on outer walls, exterior stairway building, ceiling painting, etc.
					
					 They finished the plastering and painting of office rooms and corridors covering tens of thousands square meters and tile fixing covering thousands square meters in only 10 days.
					
					 By applying rational methods, they have doubled the speed of laying stone staircases over the previous month.
					
					 They also finished the painting of arch-style ceiling boards and trusses one month earlier than scheduled.
					
					 Meanwhile, ministries and national institutions, charged with afforesting the vicinity of the stadium, have paid big efforts to tending fields of a new species of turf and trees there.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Initiates Tunnel Tactics during Korean War
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Initiates Tunnel Tactics during Korean War
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- In the last Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953) the Korean People's Army defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest in the world".
					 The victory of the KPA in the war was ascribable to the unique war tactics initiated by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Those tactics include a tunnel tactics, whose might was clearly displayed in a battle fought on Height 153.7 in Kosong County, Kangwon Province, in July 1952.
					
					 To defend the height, a KPA company had to fight the enemy's one regiment that made wavelike attacks for at least 14 hours a day. The fierce battle left more than 900 enemy troops dead or injured, with no loss on the part of the company relied on the tunnel tactics.
					
					The tactics also led the battles on Height 1 211 to victory. In 1952 alone, the enemy dropped 4 160 bombs and showered 527,260 shells per one square kilometer of the height. But, the battles ended in victory for the KPA.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Anti-U.S., Anti-Imperialist Class Education
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Anti-U.S., Anti-Imperialist Class Education
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors have become evermore undisguised in their moves to stifle the DPRK. This reality calls for waging a more dynamic class struggle against imperialism. Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The class education is an important work related to the destiny of the country, revolution and socialism.
					
					 Only when we conduct the class education to raise the people's class consciousness uninterruptedly, is it possible to preserve the revolutionary principle and nature of socialism to the last and victoriously advance the revolution and construction under any difficult and complicated circumstance and condition.
					
					 What does the tragic situation that socialism collapsed and capitalism was restored in some countries in the 1990s show?
					
					 To neglect and weaken the class education is as foolish an act as digging one's own grave by oneself.
					
					 If the ideological and class positions are pulled down, the revolutionary ranks will be disorganized, the economic and cultural positions collapse and, worse still, the gains of the revolution achieved with blood will be lost. This is a serious lesson taught by history and reality.
					
					 The banner of Songun put up by the DPRK is the most steadfast banner of independence against imperialism and the banner of class struggle. It should always hold the arms of revolution and class in the present drive for defending socialism.
					
					 The Korean revolution will never neglect and weaken the class education no matter how much water flow under the bridge and no matter how frequently a generation is replaced by a new one.

articles.title: U.S. Will Get Nothing by Escalating Provocation and Pressure: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Will Get Nothing by Escalating Provocation and Pressure: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now staging the joint marine exercise with the south Korean puppet forces with the involvement of the flotilla of the nuclear carrier George Washington and the group of Aegis destroyer Kidd in the South and East seas of Korea. From coming Tuesday, it is going to conduct the large-scale joint marine drill in the sea near Jeju Island.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. often brands the DPRK as the provoker and disturber of peace but the recent joint marine exercise has brought to bolder relief its true colors as real provoker and disturber of peace.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly interested in ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula, it will have to make a bold decision for stopping all joint military drills.
					
					 But the U.S. is acting quite contrary to this.
					
					 It has never wished for the improvement of the north-south relations and whenever there was a sign for detente on the peninsula, it tarnished the climate of reconciliation and cooperation by fabricating shocking cases and inveigling the south Korean puppet forces in the joint military drills.
					
					 The DPRK has never thought about getting peace and security provided by the U.S. and feels no need to do so.
					
					 The DPRK defends its own peace and security by itself.
					
					 This is the firm revolutionary stand of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces would be well advised to clearly bear in mind once again this invariable stand and will of the DPRK.
					
					 It will get nothing through escalated provocation and pressure.

articles.title: Ulji Freedom Guardian Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
Ulji Freedom Guardian Joint Military Exercises under Fire
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean authorities every year are extremely reckless and dangerous war maneuvers for aggression and the root cause of disasters as they are deepening distrust and escalating confrontation between the north and the south and blocking the north-south relations from being mended. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article. 
					 The DPRK is making every possible effort to improve the north-south relations and achieve peace and reunification of the country, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK decided to send its players group and cheerleading squad to the 17th Asian Games slated to take place in Inchon. This is the patriotic measure to mend the north-south relations and open up the way for national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities say that they are welcoming the participation in the games by the DPRK's players group and cheerleading squad but, in actuality, taking improper attitude and laying a stumbling block with a sinister political purpose. 
					
					 The present situation proves that the south Korean authorities have still sought confrontation policy, not getting rid of the anachronistic hostile conception. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should discard the old conception of distrust and confrontation and do things helpful to the north-south relations and good to advance them. They should never do anti-reunification acts.
					
					 If they stage the joint military exercises in disregard of the just demand of the DPRK, the north-south relations will be driven into a dangerous phase once again. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to face up to the grave situation and take a right option.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Reckless Moves to Stifle DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Reckless Moves to Stifle DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Units of the Korean People's Army recently conducted tactical rocket firing and artillery shelling drills.
					 As regards this, the south Korean puppet group some days ago sent a letter to a committee of the UN requesting it to deal with the issue of the DPRK's missile launch, terming it a "violation of the resolutions". Meanwhile, a spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense blustered that the south Korean army would "unhesitatingly retaliate against the KPA" if it fires shells into waters south of the "northern limit line," talking about a very serious threat and describing the above-said issue as a grave case. Even the chief executive strongly urged the military group to strongly react against any provocation of the north at its initial stage.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a deliberate far-fetched assertion as it serves as a premeditated provocation to bedevil the inter-Korean relations and escalate the confrontation on the Korean peninsula and realize its scenario to stifle the DPRK through cooperation with foreign forces.
					
					 No matter how fair-minded and just one may be, one is bound to be a plaything of the strong if one is weak and a precious history which has been carried forward at the cost of blood is bound to lose its shine in a moment. This is not only a lesson taught by history but a hard reality today.
					
					 The DPRK would like to clarify once again it will not step back even an inch from the road of bolstering up the capability for self-defence, no matter what others may say.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to contain the reckless confrontation racket of the warmongers at home and abroad to stifle the DPRK by force at any cost by dint of its powerful military deterrence and defend the security of the nation and peace of the country as firm as an iron wall.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to stop such foolish act of wasting energy for useless backbiting and take actions to defuse the tensions and improve the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Disbandment of U.S.-S. Korea "Combined Forces Command" Urged
articles.content:
Disbandment of U.S.-S. Korea "Combined Forces Command" Urged
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea at a press conference in Seoul on July 17 protested against the U.S. arrogant attitude to keep the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" in Ryongsan.
					 The organization blasted the U.S. for keeping the command there unlike its original plan to transfer it to Phyongthaek along with its units.
					
					 It called for totally disbanding the "Combined Forces Command" and thus removing the root cause of the U.S. unjustifiable demand.
					
					 The organization demanded the reexamination of the agreement on the transfer of the U.S. military base in Ryongsan as it was decided at its request and the blame for breaking the promise rests with it.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Deceptive Unification Policy Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Deceptive Unification Policy Blasted
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. posted on its website on July 17 an article contributed by its member denouncing the south Korean authorities' deceptive unification policy.
					 The farce of setting up the "committee for preparations for unification" announced by the south Korean authorities on July 15 was prompted by their gangster-like and sinister intention, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The farce to set up the committee which excludes pro-reunification patriotic forces while denying the June 15 joint declaration fully supported by the people is bound to go bust just like the "Dresden declaration" and the policy of "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars".
					
					 The unification policy which is not supported by the north is nothing but a political charade to maintain the puppet forces' base and deceive the people.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should lift the "May 24 step" if they truly want to build confidence for unification. Only then will it be possible to realize the reunions of separated families and relatives, north-south exchanges and peaceful reunification.
					
					 They should implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, though belatedly, and take part in the great cause of the independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Opening Rice Market
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Opening Rice Market
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, a south Korean internet paper, on July 19 in an editorial protested against the authorities' policy of opening the rice market.
					 The editorial accused the authorities of clarifying on July 18 it would totally open the rice market from January 1 next year and impose high tariff to this end.
					
					 It criticized the "government" for concealing such unfavorable problems as the possibility of sharp increase of compulsory rice import in case the high tariff is applied.
					
					 It demanded the chief executive settle the situation, saying that there is no ground for the "government" to exist as it does not represent the interests of the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Protests Opening Market to Foreign Cereals
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Protests Opening Market to Foreign Cereals
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The South Kyongsang Provincial Federation of the south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations on July 18 staged a protest against the authorities' act of opening the market to foreign cereals in Tochon-myon, Changnyong County, South Kyongsang Province.
					 The organization at a press conference disclosed that the "government's" hasty declaration of the decision on opening the market was to calm down the public anger in advance.
					
					 It gave vent to its anger, terming the opening of the market to foreign cereals a food disaster following the ferry Sewol tragedy.
					
					 It said it would turn out in actions against the opening of the market that threatens the existence of life, stressing it would go into a long-term tent strike in front of the South Kyongsang Provincial Office from July 21.
					
					 After the press conference, members of the organization ploughed the field as part of its anti-"government" actions.

articles.title: U.S. Joint Military Exercises Flailed by Koreans in China
articles.content:
U.S. Joint Military Exercises Flailed by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on July 17.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK's positive efforts and sincere measures for mending the north-south ties are being absolutely supported and welcomed by all Koreans and world peace-loving people.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the U.S. is staging the joint military exercises again with the south Korean puppet forces with the involvement of the flotilla of the nuclear carrier and the group of Aegis destroyers.
					
					 Their reckless military acts are the mockery of the sincere efforts made by the army and people of the DPRK to dispel the tensions and create the peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula and an open challenge to all Koreans and world peace-loving people aspiring after peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should positively respond to the just proposals of the DPRK and opt for the national reconciliation and cooperation, though belatedly.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China will fight it out against the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula together with all Koreans and world peace-loving people.

articles.title: Korean in China Calls for Foiling Moves of Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Korean in China Calls for Foiling Moves of Confrontation with DPRK
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Kwon Hon, chief of the Shenyang City branch of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement on July 18  condemning the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities for their war moves against the DPRK.
					 The statement noted:
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is inching close to the war owing to their saber-rattling.
					
					 The south Korean authorities tainted with sycophancy towards the U.S. are kicking off the joint military drills targeting the DPRK in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are persistently depending on the U.S., turning their back away from the nation, an indication that they have no iota of thought about national reunification and try to reduce south Korea to the colony of the U.S. forever.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should come to their senses and take a right option, understanding that there is a way out in the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, national reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean authorities refuse to respond to the sincere proposals of the DPRK and push the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war, only death will wait for them.
					
					 All Koreans of the Shenyang City branch of the General Association of Koreans in China would together with the people in the homeland turn out as one in the struggle to foil the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers for confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Koreans in China Assail U.S.-S. Korean Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Koreans in China Assail U.S.-S. Korean Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration made public a statement on July 18.
					 Nuclear carrier George Washington and a flotilla of Aegis destroyer of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces kicked off combined maritime drills with the south Korean navy in the South and East seas of Korea despite repeated protest by the DPRK and strong denunciation at home and abroad, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 They are mulling staging a large-scale joint maritime drill in the waters off Jeju Island by involving marine forces of Japan.
					
					 The Chinese Regional Committee bitterly denounces in the name of the Korean nation the unpardonable war provocation moves of the U.S. to inflict on the Korean nation the disaster of a nuclear war by igniting a new war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The present situation clearly shows that the U.S. does not want improved inter-Korean relations and reunification of the Korean peninsula but has a sinister intention only to unleash a new war by escalating tensions at any cost.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave themselves, clearly understanding the desire of Koreans and the trend of the times.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors launch a reckless military provocation despite the DPRK's warning, its army and people will never miss a chance but deal a merciless retaliatory blow at the aggressors.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 14 on the occasion of the second anniversary of the conferment of the title of Marshal of the DPRK on supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was awarded the title of Marshal of the DPRK on July 17, Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 He is another general of Mt. Paektu and illustrious commander possessed of distinguished military wisdom and iron will.
					
					 He is leading the party, state and army with his gifted military stratagem and commanding art.
					
					 He is a peerless Songun brilliant commander who turned socialist Korea into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 The DPRK is bolstering up its nuclear deterrent under his Songun leadership.
					
					 The conferment of the title of Marshal of the DPRK upon him is an expression of the deep trust and respect of all the service personnel of the KPA and the Korean people for him.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK, where he is leading the drive to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in China
Beijing, July 20 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened in Tianjin, China on July 17 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in the exhibition hall were photos documenting the noble revolutionary careers and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the creative talents of the Korean people were also on show.
					
					 Participants in the opening ceremony laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Speakers said they recollected with deep emotion the whole life of Kim Il Sung, a prominent great man recognized by the world, through the exhibition on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise. The exhibition which opened in the significant place associated with revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will offer an important occasion in boosting the friendly ties between the two countries, they added.
					
					 The Korean people are enjoying a happy life in society where the free medical care and education systems are in force, they said, vowing to conduct more brisk cultural exchange between the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Regional On-line Seminar on Kim Il Sung and Independent Development of Africa Held
articles.content:
Regional On-line Seminar on Kim Il Sung and Independent Development of Africa Held
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- There took place a regional on-line seminar on President Kim Il Sung and independent development of Africa on July 8.
					 Displayed in the main venue of the seminar in Kinshasa of the DR Congo was the portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 It was attended by the director-general, the secretary general and directors of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, figures of the Juche idea study organizations and organization for solidarity with the Korean people in the DR Congo and followers of the Juche idea, more than 100 in all.
					
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo, made a report at the seminar.
					
					 Referring to the significance of the African regional on-line seminar on the undying feats the President performed for the times and mankind held to commemorate the 20th anniversary of his demise, the secretary general said:
					
					 The President embodied the Juche idea in practice all his life, turning the DPRK into a power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense and clarifying the orientation and way for the national liberation struggle in colonies to many people who were subject to exploitation and oppression by the imperialists.
					
					 The leaders of African countries desirous of the national prosperity and independent development should follow the example of the President, the sun of the 20th century, and make their way through ordeals and difficulties by dint of the Juche idea.
					
					 The speakers included the chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the director-general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 They highly praised the ideological and theoretical feats of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and expressed their will to more widely study and disseminate the Juche idea and the Songun idea in the African region and thus make positive contributions to accomplishing the global cause of independence.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Vocero de Departamento de Politica del CDN advierte a EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Vocero de Departamento de Politica del CDN advierte a EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ACNC) -- El vocero del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 20 una declaracion para condenar la campana anti-RPDC que lanzan Estados Unidos y sus satelites cuestionando la justa medida de la RPDC para incrementar su capacidad de autodefensa nacional.
					La nota senala como sigue:
					
					Las unidades de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inclusive las estrategicas, realizan sucesivamente los lanzamientos de cohetes tacticos de alta precision y los ejercicios de artilleria de diferentes misiones como parte de las maniobras para mejorar la capacidad de autodefensa nacional.
					
					El triunfo de gran importancia alcanzado en esos ejercicios de combate estimula mucho al ejercito y pueblo siendo envidiado por los hombres del mundo amantes de la paz y aspirantes a la justicia.
					
					Se portan mal solo EE.UU. y sus satelites como la banda de Park Geun-hye y otras fuerzas malsanas exponiendo sus entranas aviesas.
					
					EE.UU. dice que "el Norte de Corea le ejerce  una amenaza inusual y especial" como si los cohetes tacticos de la RPDC hubieran entrado en el ataque al territorio estadounidense. Y describe los ejercicios rutinarios del EPC como "provocacion de baja intensidad con fines politicos" y "sucesiva amenaza militar contra los paises aliados de la region".
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas tambien dicen que los lanzamientos de cohetes tacticos y los ejercicios de artilleria del EPC son una "reaccion a la negativa a la propuesta especial y la declaracion del gobierno (de la RPDC)", "provocacion peligrosa que exacerba la tension militar" y "amenaza intencional" a si mismas.
					
					Ademas, arman escandalo por conducto del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, que hace mucho tiempo perdio la imparcialidad, para inducir en error la opinion publica.
					
					Se suman a esa payasada algunos paises flojos que siendo complices de EE.UU., tratan de abrazar a Park Geun-hye actualmente en la situacion miserable.
					
					En cuanto a esa campana absurda que se libra invirtiendo la verdad, el Departamento de Politica del CDN vuelve a advertir a EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas recogiendo la opinion del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					1. EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas deben hablar conociendo bien primero la concepcion de "provocacion" y "amenaza".
					
					?Si el lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos de la RPDC constituye la "provocacion" contra EE.UU. y la "amenaza" a la estabilidad y la paz de la region, como se debe decir de los incontables lanzamientos de misiles estrategicos de EE.UU. y los ejercicios militares contra la RPDC que realiza a menudo el imperio en la tierra ajena con los gangsteres de la capa militar del Sur de Corea?
					
					Las provocaciones y la amenaza de verdad en la Peninsula Coreana son las maniobras politicas y militares que se promueven segun la politica hostil contra la RPDC y la belicosa estrategia militar de EE.UU.
					
					La provocacion tipica es la imprudente intrusion en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC que cometen casi todos los dias los belicistas surcoreanos.
					
					2. EE.UU. y las autoridades del Sur de Corea no deben incurrir mas en el descarado acto de bandido.
					
					?Como se puede describir el acto bandidesco de EE.UU., fautor de provocacion y amenaza, que desarrolla casi todos los dias en otro pais los ejercicios de agresion y guerra, y de las autoridades surcoreanas enloquecidas por la confrontacion fratricida que tildan de "provocacion" y "amenaza" los ejercicios militares autodefensivos de la RPDC que se realizan en la tierra, mar y cielo propios?
					
					Es un procedimiento de bandido que ultraja al dueno que quiere defender su casa con fuerzas propias.
					
					Tal vez salga con la suya en otras partes ese acto de bandido, pero nunca sera aceptado en esta tierra defendida por el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					3. Cuanto mas recurran a las hostilidades gangsteriles, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas tanto mas enfrentaran la represalia inimaginablemente fuerte de la RPDC.
					
					A traves de la propuesta importante y el mensaje abierto de enero pasado, la propuesta especial de junio y la declaracion del gobierno de julio, la RPDC hizo todo lo posible por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Lo unico que falta es la opcion final.
					
					EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas no deben actuar con imprudencia hablando de la "provocacion" y "amenaza" de alguien.
					
					Por el contrario, todas las fuerzas disuasivas de la RPDC para la autodefensa se mantendran en la disposicion perfecta para castigar todas las fuerzas malsanas de este mundo, manifestaran su poderio sin rival y responderan con las justas acciones de venganza.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de secretario general de Comite Regional Africano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de secretario general de Comite Regional Africano
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le enviara el dia 8 el secretario general del Comite Regional Africano para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, Andre Lohekele Kalonda, en representacion de los participantes en el seminario regional via Internet sobre el gran Presidente Kim Il Sung y el desarrollo independiente de Africa. 
					La misiva aplaude las relaciones entre los dirigentes de la Republica Democratica del Congo y de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea quienes manifestaron el espiritu de la paz, el desarrollo independiente y la solidaridad internacional desde cuando se acordaron establecer con libertad e igualdad las relaciones diplomaticas basadas en la unidad y solidaridad entre los pueblos de ambos paises. 
					
					Ahora ilumina claramente el camino a seguir por el mundo la idea Juche, concebida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y enriquecida por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, afirma la carta y continua:
					
					Es por eso que con motivo del 20o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, Sol del siglo 20, reafirmamos la decision de enaltecer invariablemente a ese gran hombre y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo sirve para nosotros de manual ideologico para conocer bien los problemas pendientes de los paises africanos y buscar las respuestas a los problemas en que ponen muchos empenos los pueblos africanos. 
					
					Hoy dia, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea recibe la sabia orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, gracias a lo cual marcha la construccion de una potencia prospera en todos los dominios y esta empresa saldra siempre victoriosa. 
					
					Los adeptos a la idea Juche del continente africano apoyan los esfuerzos y la decision de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un por la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana, sagrada causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Hay que intensificar educacion clasista, senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Hay que intensificar educacion clasista, senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ACNC) -- En el editorial de hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que se tornan cada dia brutales las maquinaciones de Estados Unidos y la banda de titeres surcoreanos para aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y agrega que ese hecho demanda intensificar la lucha clasista y antiimperialista.
					La educacion clasista es una tarea importante relacionada con el destino de la patria, la revolucion y el socialismo, apunta el editorial y prosigue:
					
					Hay que impulsar sin parar la educacion para elevar la conciencia clasista del pueblo.
					
					Asi se puede mantener hasta el final los principios revolucionarios y el caracter connatural del socialismo y llevar adelante la revolucion y la construccion en cualesquier condiciones dificiles y complicadas.
					
					El derrumbe del socialismo y el renacimiento del capitalismo en varios paises en la decada de 1990 ensenan que menospreciar y debilitar la educacion clasista son acto suicida.
					
					La historia y la realidad dejan la seria leccion de que si se destruyen la base ideologica y la clasista, seran descompuestas las filas revolucionarias y se retrocedera en la trinchera economica y cultural asi como se perderan las conquistas de la revolucion alcanzadas con sangre.
					
					La bandera del Songun de la RPDC es la de independencia antiimperialista y la de lucha clasista mas firme y no se puede dejar jamas en el combate para defender el socialismo el arma de la revolucion y el de clase.
					
					Aunque transcurra mucho tiempo y se cambien las generaciones, no habra en la revolucion coreana el relajamiento de la educacion clasista.
